article_title: Rural pediatric patients at higher risk for readmissions, complex conditions
article_text:

article_metadata.description: Rural children have far higher rates of chronic conditions than non-rural children, as well as higher risks of readmission and steeper costs of care, according to a study published in Pediatrics.

og.description: Rural children have far higher rates of chronic conditions than non-rural children, as well as higher risks of readmission and steeper costs of care, according to a study published in Pediatrics.
